website_summaries.verdict: If you enjoy salt and vinegar potato chips, these crunchy treats are likely to become you new favorite snack.
pros: Feature a zesty flavor that fans of salt and vinegar potato chips rave about
24 single-serve bags are easy to pack for lunches or take on the go
cons: Consumers who prefer a more subdued flavor may find these chips a bit too tart

customer_reviews.title: Emergency chips
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the quarantine. Ended up eating them all in two days. Best chips of my life.
customer_reviews.author: SadSandwich

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed - Bags Not Sealed.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chips, was excited to buy in bulk online. Extremely disappointed when I notice all but 6 of the bags were OPEN in the box. It's like they were never sealed along the back seam at all. Completely unacceptable, will not order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: ThatTwistedMetalGuy

customer_reviews.title: Unwanted ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I like the individual size bags. I ordered and received the cheddar flavor. They arrived in good shape. BUT the flavor also included onion and garlic which I never eat because they cause very painful indigestion. I was very disappointed these ingredients were not listed in the description on the front of the package.
customer_reviews.author: AUNT BUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Always Taste Good With Amazon
customer_reviews.text: When it’s Fresh you know it’s from Amazon Prime. Never had a problem with freshness from Amazon yet one time it wasn’t so fresh and the chips seem over done dark brown seem to be a defected brunch of potato chips. Yet that was only one time hopefully there will not be a second... Anyway I love these brand of chips spicy 🌶 and seeds a little salty not always yet at time so if you have High Blood 🩸 Pressure. Be aware and treat yourself to a bag once and awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Shymemnoch

customer_reviews.title: ~ Fresh, Satisfyingly Crunchy and Delicious, Plenty of time before expiration ~
customer_reviews.text: Love the Jalapeno Kettle Potato Chips. They arrived safely with no problems, well-packed and not crunched up. There was plenty of time before the clearly-marked expiration date and they tasted and smelled fresh and so good. These chips are so satisfyingly crunchy and delicious. Oh no, after writing this review, I'm going to have to send for more!
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor but not whole, tiny bits of chips.
customer_reviews.text: These have a pretty decent taste. They are very small chips. Many of mine arrived broken. Really up in the air on this item. Flavor is acceptable. More bits than whole chips is not. So 3* for a good flavor but lost 2* for arriving in bits. Hopefully they can improve this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crum

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, perfect serving size
customer_reviews.text: I buy these small bags rather than the big bags at the store, because of portion size control. I never have to worry about overeating anymore! The flavor of this brand of chips has always been my favorite: perfect balance of tangy + salty, and crunchy! I always look forward to eating my daily bag, like a dog waiting for a treat. :)
customer_reviews.author: Vanya

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate packaging=crushed chips
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite brand of salt and vinegar chips, but they taste fine. I wanted to leave a review here because I was very disappointed in the shipping of my product. Potato chips arrived along with big packs of canned sparkling water but they were not protected in a separate box but only in a bag. So, needless to say, half of them were crushed. I've canceled my subscription for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The flavor I ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of cheese! Sorry...they had no cheesy flavor! Tasted just like a plain potato chip and salty! Maybe someone forgot to put on the cheese? Have always liked kettle chips and there delicious flavor. Will not reorder! People in charge....start tasting what goes out to consumers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these potato chips
customer_reviews.text: I love these potato chips, and find the packaging size makes these easy to include in a packed lunch. Sometimes they seem a little over salted, like the way the chips in the bottom of a large bag can be, but this bag is small, so the issue can be pronounced. Still an awesome chip, and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy and Free

customer_reviews.title: Crunch for Days, But Could Go Lighter on the Salt
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the Kettle brand. The crunch is powerful and not for the faint of tooth enamel. (Just the way I like it.) My only caveat about the hot jalapeno flavor is the sodium level. If they could dial back the salt a little I'd be a happy camper.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Chips
customer_reviews.text: When I buy larger packages of this chip there are so many broken pieces. Many more than full size chips. Not so with these smaller packages. All are whole chips. I wonder why that isn’t so in larger bags? Anyway, these are perfect, and perfect serving size.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hull

customer_reviews.title: So good I can't get enough!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these several times. They are so good I don't even try other brands anymore because they don't compare in taste. The salt and pepper are my favorite. It saves me more to buy the 24 pack here than the individual ones when you can find them in the store. Amazon is my go to store.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie C

customer_reviews.title: The best salt and vinegar chips
customer_reviews.text: I love salt and vinegar chips. And in my opinion Kettle makes the best ones. Nice favor nice crunch. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Cook

customer_reviews.title: A win, win.. fresh, handy, flavorful..
customer_reviews.text: Love the individual bags, the last bag is as fresh as the first.. I am less likely to Binge on the chips .. enjoy the flavor of the chips..
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: The most delicious chips I've eaten
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of jalapeno flavored goods, and these by far are my favorite. They aren't overly salted nor are they overly spicy. They have a solid flavor to them that makes you want to keep eating them. They're probably why I've gained 5 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cline

customer_reviews.title: Taste good but came crushed.
customer_reviews.text: These taste very good but I can't get over how crushed they were when they arrived. There are about 3 good size chips in each bag and the rest are tiny or crumbled. They need to rethink the way they ship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the flavor and crunch of these chips! It’s a great value for the cost and the portion size is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Martin

customer_reviews.title: Hot Dang Diggity
customer_reviews.text: Kettle Brand potato chips are super great tasting. I normally get these when I go to my local Safeway. They have a nice kick to them and isn't overly spicy at all. Super fresh and tasty. Flavor 5/5 ***** Portion Size 5/5 ***** Freshness 5/5 ***** My Recommendation 5/5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Vuong Ly

customer_reviews.title: Great cheddar chip, but not received this time.
customer_reviews.text: Cheddar is a great Ketttle chip, one of my favs. I received a box of ground pepper and salt, tastes okay so will keep, but I ordered New York Cheddar. Very unusual miss by Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Cali Girl

customer_reviews.title: OutStanding
customer_reviews.text: I do not really post on food things being. We all have our taste. I am posting on these chips because. They are soo da&^ good! Not hot "to me" but just a little kick to make you keep stuffing your face with more of them. I will be getting a LOT more of these chips. I really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Hazz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste & size, but too often stale
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste, and just the right size, but after repeated bags that are stale due to bad seals we have decided to give up on the brand. Messages to the vendor, with lot numbers, have gone unaddressed.
customer_reviews.author: OscarPhilips

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Always my go to brand for Jalapeno chips. Won't buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Wagenbach

customer_reviews.title: Best Cheddar chips I've ever had, and I don't normally like cheese flavored chips.
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot to say, thick and crunchy like kettle chips are supposed to be. The cheddar is not over done, and has a real cheddar tase. That it, I like them and I'll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: Deflated
customer_reviews.text: Sad to get a pack that had a TINY PUNCTURE HOLE near bottom of bag. It was the size of a needle. The bag deflated and had no air; thought it was a bit weird but opened it to check and it was stale just chips!
customer_reviews.author: B.rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ' ' Price Point: 5/5 ' ' Overall Taste: 5/5 ' ' Nutritional Factor: 2/5 ' ' Need: 1/5 ' ' Recommendation: 5/5 ' Overall: 5/5 ' The bottom line: I dont love them as much as the sea salt bag, but is a good alternative that are still great tasting. They pack the real potato punch and they are not too hot for being jalapeno. They are the hard crunchy type of chip. I don't find the eat them all mentality with this or their BBQ. Be your own judge on the health factor which these rack low to me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Collins

customer_reviews.title: Always expired
customer_reviews.text: WHY DOESN'T ANYONE CHECK EXPIRATION DATES!!! just received box that expired three days ago. WTF. Last box was expired too. Don’t buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: alwaysorderingsomething

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium tolerance for spicy foods and these are perfect. They could even be a tiny bit spicier, but I think they're the perfect amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Bean

customer_reviews.title: The no-guilt way to eat potato chips
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for somebody like me who loves potato chips but can never leave a bag for a 2nd serving. These 1.5 ounce bags allow me to eat chips without feeling guilty. Each bag is about 200 calories.
customer_reviews.author: bt nyc

customer_reviews.title: Great chip
customer_reviews.text: Thick cut and crunchy. These krinkle cut chips in salt and black pepper are so tasty. They arrived fresh and in good condition not broken and smushed.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Not For Me
customer_reviews.text: Tried Kettle Brand Potato Chips, Jalapeño after great reviews. Didn't taste like Jalapeños to me. Had a little heat and could taste the oil on them. Not my thing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: If you love salt and vinegar chips then you will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Katie F

customer_reviews.title: crunchy, flavor adventure in every bag
customer_reviews.text: Jah-lapenno chips are the best! Ricky, the H is silent.. Haaaallapeeno While these chips aren't quite as good as Vickie's brand jalapeno kettle chips, they're certainly very very good. I really don't find these chips to be "extra hot" as I can eat 3 or 4 good sized crunchy wonderful chips before even noticing the spicyness. Great combination with just about anything. Of course when you get to the bottom of the bag, things get all greasy, that's just what you get with a larger size bag
customer_reviews.author: Rockarolla306

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TASTE!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the crunch and the fact that these chips are gluten free. These chips can also be found at Whole Food.
customer_reviews.author: W**W**

customer_reviews.title: Sweet & a little spicy
customer_reviews.text: Very good, interesting flavour. They have a nice sweetness to them and aren’t too spicy (unless you eat too many). Very crunchy.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Best way to buy!
customer_reviews.text: These chips are delish and salty and greasy and all the things we love about fried potatoes. They are actually a more healthy snack than any sugary alternative. For one thing they are potatoes, salt, pepper and oil. Potatoes are full of potassium- which keeps us from having drop out and jitters. Just drink lots of good water with them. The portion is ample and the price is very economical, per bag. When you consider this size purchased individually at a market, times the amount in this box, I am saving approx. six bucks. I'll take it!
customer_reviews.author: daroo

customer_reviews.title: Tasty chips
customer_reviews.text: These were well packaged and came in excellent condition. They have a good flavor and the size is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Onion

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips, Very Crunchy, not to hot.
customer_reviews.text: Great Chips, Very Crunchy, not to hot. Amazon doesn't pack them very well but they were not potato dust or fragment when they got here.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Yohe

customer_reviews.title: ... especially towards the bottom of the bag but still good.
customer_reviews.text: A little too vinegar-y for my taste especially towards the bottom of the bag but still good.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and spicy
customer_reviews.text: If you’d like a little spice in your life, get these chips. Make sure to have a glass of milk nearby
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Not too spicy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived fresh and we're package so that none of the chips broke. They are not too spicy.
customer_reviews.author: Will S

customer_reviews.title: Sweet lots of sugar
customer_reviews.text: It has so much sugar and is so oily I will not buy it again. I can't even taste the Jalapenos.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Great jalapeño taste
customer_reviews.text: I love hot, spicy foods, but I'm not normally a person who eats potato chips, but these popped up when I was looking through the specials for Prime Pantry, so they ended up in my cart. The chips were fresh with a lot of crunch. There is a great jalapeño taste. I was impressed. My local grocery store doesn't carry these, so as long as Amazon keeps having great prices, I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Hill

customer_reviews.title: My favorite chips! We've been buying Kettle brand chips for ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite chips! We've been buying Kettle brand chips for a few years now, and for a long time my favorites were the Salt & Cracked Pepper until I tried the Jalepeno. Buying the small bags also helps to limit how much I eat at one sitting, since there's no danger of suddenly realizing you've eaten an entire 8 oz (or 13 oz) bag. I was worried that they would arrive as crumbs from shipment, but no problem there at all.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Fox

customer_reviews.title: good portions for single serve
customer_reviews.text: The sea salt kettle potato chips are my favorite, and the single serve portion is perfect. Good taste with just enough sea salt.
customer_reviews.author: Cashel Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent post-ride snack for electrolyte replenishment
customer_reviews.text: My wife has discovered that having salty potato chips after a hard mountain bike ride keeps her from getting a headache. These are her favorite, and so we always try to get them if they're available. Being able to buy them in bulk like this is great! They also go really, really well with a post-ride beer.
customer_reviews.author: cmh

customer_reviews.title: Love these chips
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my favorite chips and you get a good value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: RICK GILBERT

customer_reviews.title: Arrived WITHOUT any broken chips
customer_reviews.text: Extremely fresh .... .arrived with no broken chips...grocery stores can't even do that...tastes great
customer_reviews.author: Donald Holland

customer_reviews.title: I love these chips but when I was buying the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips but when I was buying the whole bag I was eating wayyyyy too many at a time. I bought these individual bags so that I could still enjoy the delicious chips but wouldn't over do it. The chips are the same great quality as the large bags and bonus you can easily take one with in the car or pack it in your lunch.
customer_reviews.author: italiansrock22

customer_reviews.title: I love these chips
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best chips ever! This and Lay's Jalepeno kettle chips are my favorite two chips. To put the taste in perspective for those of you who haven't tried these, but have tried the Lay's Jalepeno chips, it tastes a bit like the Lays, but has a deeper oil taste and much more seasoning. If you don't like a very powerful spicy taste, then go for the Lays, but these chips are great!
customer_reviews.author: arvinz13

customer_reviews.title: Ordered A, got B
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the: "Kettle Brand Potato Chips, Krinkle Cut Salt and Fresh Ground Pepper". This is what I ordered. I also enjoy the: "Kettle Brand Potato Chips, Sea Salt". This is what I received but Not what I ordered. -Ben
customer_reviews.author: BTHJr

customer_reviews.title: If you love Jalapeño flavor as I do
customer_reviews.text: If you love Jalapeño flavor as I do, you'll love these! They have a nice kick. The texture is absolutely wonderful! Extremely crunchy and holds up to the thickest of dips. I use Jalapeño cheese dip because I'm a glutton for punishment. I highly recommend these if you enjoy a tasty and wonderful snack. Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lady whitecrow

customer_reviews.title: Best chips...but not this time.
customer_reviews.text: All the bags had stale chips. Our money was refunded. I have ordered these before but this is the first time I've been disappointed. Leery about ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Soft grandma

customer_reviews.title: not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Tasted ok but like a lot of pantry items not very fresh
customer_reviews.author: domenick f. toscani

customer_reviews.title: Bland
customer_reviews.text: A busted and broken bag of chips would have been excusable if there had been the slightest hint of flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Ajakrista

customer_reviews.title: Best Jalapeño Potato Chips
customer_reviews.text: I much prefer these to Lay's Brand Kettle Chips. They have more flavor and they crunch just right. Just the right amount of spiciness too. Just be careful if u are signed up for Subscribe & Save like me, because the prices go up and down, I've seen them triple before, go from around $10 to around $30 without warning. Great product, though.
customer_reviews.author: Alyosha Fan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy in grease
customer_reviews.text: Goes well with salsa or sour cream dip. However it is heavy in grease.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Apex

customer_reviews.title: Good chips / stay fresh
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because we never seem to finish the larger bags when we buy them from the grocery store before they go stale. These are handy single-serve bags - perfect for a lunch. We buy the Salt & Pepper variety - which seem to be increasingly difficult to find for some reason. The price was good buying them on amazon and we save a little bit of money per ounce vs. buying the bigger bags at the grocery. And the chips stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: steinni

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: If there's anything I enjoy more than anything in this world, it's buying a bag of chips that's half empty.
customer_reviews.author: DMT

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite snack!
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is amazing! And it's the perfect portion! These are hard to find in stores in my area, so I will he ording again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Portion Control!
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips and if I buy a full size bag at the store I will eat the whole bag. This helps me portion control. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn11

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Can't beat the price as well! Will definitely order these again! Yummy with just the right amount of spice!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Honey mustard chips
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to find honey mustard chips in a store anymore. found these on line .Very good flavor.
customer_reviews.author: tiggerdunk

customer_reviews.title: Tasted okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Not my preferred go to brand of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Spicy Chip! Good crunch!
customer_reviews.text: This brand is a favorite of my oldest daughter, she can eat them every day if allowed. She likes the hint of jalepeno in each bite , and the satisfying crunch that goes with these crispy chips. The product is very well made and has good portion sizes. This brand is our favorite Kettle style chip.
customer_reviews.author: BeeButterflyLover

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, buy two.
customer_reviews.text: Well if the bag was bigger that's be pretty cool because I love these...
customer_reviews.author: Chivalrous Tomato

customer_reviews.title: The best Kettle chips as far as I'm concerned
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Very crunchy, fresh with a great salt and pepper taste. These bags are just the right size for lunch and make portion control easier for those of us who could eat a much larger bag at one sitting if no one stopped us.
customer_reviews.author: S. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor of Kettle brand chips
customer_reviews.text: Yum! Best flavor of Kettle brand chips. Betcha can't eat just one! I buy these for an office full of folks who need single serving sized products. I cannot find this size in stores! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Long

customer_reviews.title: Received Wrong order
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong order. I received the Kettle Chips in Sea Salt and not honey dijon. Aside from that, everything looked great as far as arrival and packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chips
customer_reviews.text: These chips are so good and they arrive on time , no problem what so ever. Love the flavor love the brand.
customer_reviews.author: GrimReaper

customer_reviews.title: not spicy at all
customer_reviews.text: these were not spicy at all. even my white friends thought it was bland. i wanted spicy chips. lame.
customer_reviews.author: lemon

customer_reviews.title: Damage product
customer_reviews.text: My bag came open with no air in it at all
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 24 pack... Got 23 as one was eaten
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box of 24 Kettle chip packs of Salt and Pepper one of the bags was opened from the bottom and no chips were inside. NO chips were in the box either. Seems to me someone missed on the oversight precess.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: Best money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted these chips but when I moved out of state they didn’t have them in store I was so bummed ☹️, BEST MONEY SPENT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Chips to the lips after a dip.
customer_reviews.text: Addictingly crunchy. Spicy enough to take a handful and set the bag down for later. They're a bit greasy but that's expected with Kettle chips. If you can find some decent french onion dip, you've found a heavenly combo.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cat

customer_reviews.title: Bags did not survive shipping.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and some other chips through Amazon Fresh, but these were the only bags that had burst open.
customer_reviews.author: DU

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA, SEPARATE SMALL BAGS OF CHIPS
customer_reviews.text: These taste great. I eat a bag for lunch every day. This way I know exactly how many I'm eating and they're always fresh. Of course, buying a large bag is cheaper but you eat varying amounts per day and each day a large bag gets less fresh.
customer_reviews.author: El Puma

customer_reviews.title: Truly addicting :)
customer_reviews.text: I'd always hated salt and vinegar chips because *all* I tasted was salt, salt and more salt ... and then I discovered these. Wow! These are honestly the best chips - of any flavor - that I've ever had. They're incredibly crunchy which makes them take longer to eat and they have SO much flavor that I don't find myself having to eat a whole huge bag to get my salty fix :)
customer_reviews.author: Ginni Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious! Flavorful! Not too spicy! Quality ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but positive things to say about the flavor, ingredients, and brand. I also had a positive experience with the shipping & delivery process of my order. I will purchase these chips and more flavors by the brand in the future!
customer_reviews.author: MANY

customer_reviews.title: Bag was opened
customer_reviews.text: Bag was open and chips were everywhere. Trashed the entire bag
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I love Kettle Chips, haven't had a flavor I didn't like, these krinkle salt and pepper are great, I love the thickness of the krinkle cut. The size of these bags is perfect for a snack, just one serving. I bought these so I could have built in portion control and able to pack a lunch for work. Subscribe and save is fantastic making these a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brandice

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: Who does not love these chips! On second order now!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very upset that I received an entire box of chips that will expire in less than 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: These chips were OK but some packages were a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: These chips were OK but some packages were a bit stale even though the expiration date was well in the future. I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: R. King

customer_reviews.title: I eat these when I want to spit fireballs like Bowser. Well
customer_reviews.text: I eat these when I want to spit fireballs like Bowser. Well... not really, but look these tasted fresh and great just as if you had bought them at the store. I love these chips.
customer_reviews.author: Stugi

customer_reviews.title: Busted bag, can I get a refund or exchange???
customer_reviews.text: Best jalapeño flavor out there! Too bad the the bag didn’t hold together in the shipment. Tried the return/exchange/refund option, but I can’t seem to locate it. Shouldn’t be this hard.
customer_reviews.author: Vince in BK

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in Shipment
customer_reviews.text: Chips arrived with bag open and the chips crushed into small bits
customer_reviews.author: James Miner

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to go wrong with these. This is a staple from my childhood and much cheaper than my local grocery store. this is also a great grocery item to add to an amazon grocery box you need to fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Led Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: yummy--nice and crispy, good flavored--the kids at my daughter's school fight to get some from her. I love that there are no bad ingredients or preservatives in them (except oil isn't good for you but hey, it's potato chips, right?!)
customer_reviews.author: Java

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: These chips arrived end of March, expiring in July, 4 mos. They r stale. I have had this brand b4 from grocery store. These r tasteless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Food Always Stale From Amazon...  tired of it.
customer_reviews.text: If you get get them fresh, this is a great product. Chips were hard and borderline STALE. Any time I try ordering food on Amazon I get stale or near stale product. Never again!!
customer_reviews.author: Marx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chips
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chips and right to my door. After nearly everyplace around here quit handling Miss Vickie's Jalapeno I thought, "there has got to be another option," and there is!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack
customer_reviews.text: These chips are just the right crunch and not too greasy. The perfect snack for kids or adults alike.
customer_reviews.author: ErinAnn Knudsen

customer_reviews.title: Jalepeno chips
customer_reviews.text: These are not hot at all. Jalepeno chips are disappointing, mostly sweet and no spice
customer_reviews.author: Ignatius Kopulus

customer_reviews.title: Last time I ordered them they tasted stale
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good first couple of times I ordered them but last batch was disappointing so I will not be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: J. Silva

customer_reviews.title: Chips expire in 20 Days
customer_reviews.text: Whenever you see these chips at a deep discount it may be because they are nearing their best before date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty chips with a little spice
customer_reviews.text: Yum. Our favorite chips. Update 1/11/2016. This has been a subscribe and save order for us for several months now. Always good. But the last delivery came with an expiration date of 6 days in the future. That's an issue I've worried about in the past.
customer_reviews.author: A reviewer from Bham, AL

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Flavor of Chips
customer_reviews.text: These chips go with most of my favorite lunch entrees - sandwiches, paninis, soups, salads, etc.. I feel better about this brand as opposed to Lays, Ruffles, because these chips are made from nonGMO potatoes. I try not to eat chips too much, but when I do, I go with the superior brand!
customer_reviews.author: Empathy

customer_reviews.title: Tasty dijon flavor with crunches
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty flavor and not super overpowering. Shared with colleagues who aren't fans of mustard flavors and favored this too. The chips are all in tact with a slight bit of grease left over on fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Liang

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flavor
customer_reviews.text: My whole family devoured this within a week. I have a low tolerance for spice, but I could eat a bag and it taste so delicious. It is not the kind of spicy you expect. I would definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

product_meta.title: Kettle Brand Potato Chips, Sea Salt and Vinegar, Single-Serve 1.5 Ounce (Pack of 24)
product_meta.description: Flavor:Sea Salt & VinegarIs it presumptuous to call a chip a harmonic convergence of flavor? You might want to taste this chip before you answer. How else can you describe the perfect balance of zesty sea salt, a hint of tongue-puckering vinegar and satisfying crunch? Your mouth is watering, isn't it? Ours sure is. When you open a bag of Kettle Brand potato chips, you know you're getting incredible tasting potato chips made with authentic recipes from quality ingredients by real people.
feature_bullets: The perfect balance of zesty sea salt, a hint of tongue puckering vinegar, and satisfying crunch
Made with simple, natural ingredients you trust
Non GMO Project Verified; Certified Gluten Free
No trans fat or artificial preservatives; Kosher Parve; BPA Free
Small bags make the perfect lunch side, afternoon treat, or snack on the go (24 per order)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
